name: Proximity Voice Chat
description:
Welcome~

I created a small, fun experience where players can create or join a room, select available avatars, think of a cool unique username, and join a voice chat server to communicate and interact with other players within the room :)

I used PhotonNetwork PUN2 for the player network aspect (multiplayer) and I used Agora Voice Chat SDK for the virtual voice chat implemented in ever room.

Credits Characters
